alert.note: Alert for Collier; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 27 at 4:08PM EDT until September 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Collier County in southwestern Florida... North central Mainland Monroe County in southwestern Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 408 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Loop Road Ee Center, or 18 miles east of Chokoloskee, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
